title: Extended/Wide Slab Serif Recommendations
content:
I think the subject says it all.

I am loking for some recomendations of wide slab serifs.  
A serious established look.

 [‹ Optimal Signage Legibility Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/typophile.com/node/14300 "Go to previous forum topic") [Results & Guaranteed: A visual representation ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/typophile.com/node/14452 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
’ [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Dispatch)’ _( Extended )_, _by [Cyrus Highsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrus%252BHighsmith) / Font Bureau_, _maybe_.?  
_( Or one of [the ’Hellenic’ ’reincarnations’](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/typophile.com/node/14434).? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20071024005355/http:/www.formlos.net/)
Another Font Bureau font: Giza (lighter weights)
